scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.build:server: cd server && yarn build && mv build/ ../dist/
scripts.build:client: cd client && yarn build && mv build/ ../dist/src/client
scripts.install:server: cp server/package.json ./dist/ && cd dist && yarn install --production
scripts.deploy: yarn build:server && yarn install:server && yarn build:client
